entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Akulivik
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:30 AM EST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -35.5°C
entry.summary:

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 33.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 33. Wind chill minus 52 this morning and minus 45 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Saturday 04 February 2023
